overview: A chronic gambler whose addiction has lost him his ranch. On the verge of total bustitude, he discovers that a gold mine, of which he is part-owner, has finally paid off. Once his debts are settled, his first move is to buy out the local banker who'd foreclosed on him.
tagline: Rootin', Shootin', Tootin' Hoot is a whirlwind of action.
title: A Hero on Horseback
